recommended_degree: Desain Komunikasi Visual, Multimedia, Teknik Multimedia Digital, Teknik Informatika Multimedia, Desain Grafis (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
A Motion and Graphic Design Intern will assist in creating simple animations, designing visual assets, and editing short videos for marketing or internal projects. The intern will support the creative team by developing design materials, enhancing existing visuals, and helping with basic multimedia tasks as needed.

This role is suitable for fresh graduates from Multimedia, Visual Communication Design, Graphic Design, or related fields. Candidates should be able to use Adobe After Effects, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, or other design tools, demonstrate creativity, and maintain strong attention to detail. A positive attitude, willingness to learn, ability to collaborate in a team, and having a personal laptop to support work activities are required for this internship.
